org.keycloak.mappers

Interface UserFederationMapper

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Provider
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    LDAPFederationMapper
    All Known Implementing Classes:

    public interface UserFederationMapper
extends Provider
    Author:
    Marek Posolda

    • Method Detail

      • syncDataFromFederationProviderToKeycloak

        UserFederationSyncResult syncDataFromFederationProviderToKeycloak(UserFederationMapperModel mapperModel,
                                                                  UserFederationProvider federationProvider,
                                                                  KeycloakSession session,
                                                                  RealmModel realm)
        Sync data from federated storage to Keycloak. It's useful just if mapper needs some data preloaded from federated storage (For example load roles from federated provider and sync them to Keycloak database) Applicable just if sync is supported (see UserFederationMapperFactory.getSyncConfig() )
        Parameters:
        mapperModel -
        federationProvider -
        session -
        realm -
        See Also:
        UserFederationMapperFactory.getSyncConfig()

                                                                  UserFederationProvider federationProvider,
                                                                  KeycloakSession session,
                                                                  RealmModel realm)
        Sync data from Keycloak back to federated storage
